text: StreetTeam - https://street-team.workable.com/ - London, UK - Onsite - Permanent - Full-time. StreetTeam is building a global platform that enables advocates to sell the products they love to their friends. We're growing fast, breaking new ground and are well funded by some of the best in the business. We seek Frontend Engineers with react.js/relay background ideally. Please contact james.peters@getstreetteam.com for more details.
